Header: 2 motorcyclists wearing full face helmets rob 3.1 million rupees
Content: Nearly 3.1 million rupees have been robbed from a private institution while the money was taken to be deposited in a bank at Aramanagolla in Horana this noon. Police said two motor cyclists wearing full-face helmets have carried out the robbery while the money was being transported by a van. Police also said the two robbers armed with a gun were wearing clothes similar to army uniforms. Several police teams have been deployed to arrest the suspects.
